qas.question: Where is the Nea Moni Monastery located?
Who established the Nea Moni Monastery?
When was the Nea Moni Monastery established?
When was the mosaic at the Nea Moni Monastery destroyed?
The Nea Moni mosaics are more detailed than what what other famous mosaics?

context: The Nea Moni Monastery on <a0_0>Chios<a0_0/> was established by <a1_0>Constantine Monomachos<a1_0/> in <a2_0>1043–1056<a2_0/>. The exceptional mosaic decoration of the dome showing probably the nine orders of the angels was destroyed in <a3_0>1822<a3_0/> but other panels survived (Theotokos with raised hands, four evangelists with seraphim, scenes from Christ's life and an interesting Anastasis where King Salomon bears resemblance to Constantine Monomachos). In comparison with <a4_0>Osios Loukas<a4_0/> Nea Moni mosaics contain more figures, detail, landscape and setting.
